name: kraken-market-stream
description: A web client for handling communication with Kraken APIs and Web sockets

scripts.build:all: concurrently "npm run build:user" "npm run build:analysis" "npm run build:orderbook" "npm run build:auth" "npm run build:gateway"
scripts.start:all: concurrently "npm run start:gateway" "npm run start:user" "npm run start:analysis" "npm run start:auth" "npm run start:orderbook"
scripts.setup:all: npm run install:all && npm run build:all && npm run start:all
scripts.install:all: concurrently "cd src/services/user-service && npm install" "cd src/services/analysis-service && npm install" "cd src/services/orderbook-service && npm install" "cd src/services/auth-service && npm install" "cd src/services/api-gateway && npm install"
scripts.dev:all: concurrently "npm run dev:user" "npm run dev:orderbook" "npm run dev:auth" "npm run dev:gateway"

author: Tsvetomir Milchev
